content.question: In the third paragraph, the author criticizes the logic of those who dismiss the methods of British feminists as “irrational” (paragraph 3, sentence 2) on the grounds that they have

choices.label: misconstrued the feminists’ reasons for employing the strategies they have chosen to employ
overlooked accounts that present a less provocative view of feminist activism in Britain
ignored a key distinction between American feminists and British feminists
assumed that feminists do not understand the normal political process

content.answer: misconstrued the feminists’ reasons for employing the strategies they have chosen to employ

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
